column6: Ms. Marvel has got the whole world in her hands as she battles for the fate of humanity with an all-new foe! To make matters worse, our hero has some inner demons that need battling as well. Guest starring the Fantastic Four!
column8: | penciller (cover):Frank Cho | penciller:Roberto Delatorre | inker:Jimmy Palmiotti | writer:Brian Reed | letterer:Dave Sharpe | colorist:Chris Sotomayor
